# Claude Skills

Personal Claude Code plugins by [@gotwalt](https://github.com/gotwalt).

## Installation

```
/plugin marketplace add gotwalt/claude-skills
/plugin install standup-summary
```

## Plugins

### standup-summary

Generate standup summaries from GitHub activity across an organization. Outputs plain text suitable for Slack, automatically copied to clipboard.

**Commands:**

| Command | Description |
|---------|-------------|
| `/standup <org>` | Summarize your own GitHub activity |
| `/standup-user <org> <username>` | Summarize a team member's activity |
| `/standup-team <org>` | Summarize all merged PRs across the org |

**Features:**
- **Day-of-week aware**: On Monday, offers Friday/Weekend/Friday+Weekend options. Other weekdays offer Yesterday/Last week.
- **Flexible output**: Brief (1-2 sentences) or detailed (paragraph/bullets) formats.
- **Theme grouping**: Groups related work across repos by outcome, not by individual PR or contributor.
- **Slack-ready**: Plain text with no markdown, auto-copied to clipboard.

**Example output:**
```
Yesterday: Fixed MQTT race conditions across firmware and backend, added real-time device info updates to the full stack, and squashed several iOS bugs.
```

## Dependencies

These plugins require the following tools to be installed and configured:

| Tool | Purpose | Installation |
|------|---------|--------------|
| [GitHub CLI](https://cli.github.com/) (`gh`) | Query GitHub commits, PRs, and activity | `brew install gh` then `gh auth login` |
| `pbcopy` | Copy output to clipboard (macOS built-in) | Pre-installed on macOS |
| `date` | Calculate dates for queries | Pre-installed on macOS/Linux |

# Standup Summary

Generate standup summaries from GitHub activity across an organization.

## Commands

### `/standup <organization>`
Summarize your own GitHub activity (commits, PRs) for sharing with your team.

### `/standup-user <organization> <username>`
Summarize a specific team member's GitHub activity.

### `/standup-team <organization>`
Summarize all merged PRs across the organization, grouped by theme and importance.

## Features

- **Day-of-week aware**: On Monday, offers Friday/Weekend/Friday+Weekend options. Other days offer Yesterday/Last week.
- **Flexible output**: Choose between brief (1-2 sentences) or detailed (paragraph/bullet points) summaries.
- **Slack-ready**: Plain text output with no markdown formatting, automatically copied to clipboard.
- **Theme grouping**: Groups related work across repos by outcome, not by individual PR.

## Installation

```
/plugin marketplace add gotwalt/claude-skills
/plugin install standup-summary
```

## Usage Examples

```
/standup doma-home
/standup-user doma-home octocat
/standup-team doma-home
```
